messages.title: Protect Bedford Hospital
messages.content: Lib Dems locally have been fighting to keep key services at Bedford Hospital in the face of threats to downgrade the hospital.

messages.title: Oppose School Cuts
messages.content: Our local schools are underfunded by the government - Stephen Rutherford demands a fair deal.

messages.title: Fight against Hard Brexit
messages.content: Lib Dems are the only party that has always fought for Britain’s membership of the European Union, and that’s why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting to keep key services at Bedford Hospital in the face of threats to downgrade the hospital.
Demanding a fair deal as local schools are underfunded by the government.
Fighting for Britain's membership in the EU and for your say on the final Brexit deal.
